nodes.text: Hodeka was a male leader in the Strus clan on Jakku during the Cold War.

Hodeka favored the use of a disruptor at the time when the Strus clan came into contact with a group of nomads over the Starlight Wanderer. The clan was defeated in the encounter by a group of spacers assisting the nomads.
Hodeka appears in Fantasy Flight Games' roleplaying game adventure A Call for Heroes.
